labels.label: Enrich data by Km4city Knowledge Base

config.comments: select TO_CHAR(OBSERVATIONTIME) as OBSERVATIONTIME, TO_CHAR(ACQUISITIONTIME) as ACQUISITIONTIME, IDENTIFIER, SERVICEURI, FILLINGRATE from smartwastecontainerobservation where (now()-observationtime)<=1

entry.value: select TO_CHAR(OBSERVATIONTIME) as OBSERVATIONTIME, TO_CHAR(ACQUISITIONTIME) as ACQUISITIONTIME, IDENTIFIER, SERVICEURI, FILLINGRATE from smartwastecontainerobservation where (now()-observationtime)<=1

select TO_CHAR(OBSERVATIONTIME) as OBSERVATIONTIME, TO_CHAR(ACQUISITIONTIME) as ACQUISITIONTIME, SENSORID,SERVICEURI, ATMOSFERICPRESSURE, WINDDIRECTION, WINDSPEED, AIRTEMPERATURE, AIRHUMIDITY, RAIN, WINDGUST, DEWPOINT, PRECIPATIONTYPE, ROADTEMPERATURE, FREEZETEMPERATURE, SALTCONCENTRATION, WATERFILM, ROADCONDITION, VDC from weatherSensorObservation where (now()-observationtime)<=1

outputPorts.name: outputNGSI
outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'outputNGSI'' is invalid because Output connection for port 'outputNGSI' is not defined.

entry.value:
import json import java.io from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback
class ModJSON(StreamCallback): def __init__(self): pass def process(self, inputStream, outputStream): text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) obj = json.loads(text)
json_key = [] json_value = [] json_measure = [] json_type = [] for element in obj: if element != 'id' and element !='type': json_key.append(obj['id']) json_type.append(obj['type']) json_value.append(obj[element]['value']) json_measure.append(element)
json_data =[{"id": i, "value": v, "measure": m, "type": t} for i, v, m,t in zip(json_key, json_value, json_measure, json_type)]
outputStream.write(bytearray(json.dumps(json_data, indent=4).encode('utf-8')))
flowFile = session.get() if (flowFile != None): flowFile = session.write(flowFile, ModJSON()) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "filename", flowFile.getAttribute('filename').split('.')[0]+'_translated.json') session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) session.commit()

import json import java.io from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback
class ModJSON(StreamCallback): def __init__(self): pass def process(self, inputStream, outputStream): text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) obj = json.loads(text)
json_key = [] json_value = [] json_measure = [] json_type = [] for element in obj: if element != 'id' and element !='type': json_key.append(obj['id']) json_type.append(obj['type']) json_value.append(obj[element]['value']) json_measure.append(element)
json_data =[{"id": i, "value": v, "measure": m, "type": t} for i, v, m,t in zip(json_key, json_value, json_measure, json_type)]
outputStream.write(bytearray(json.dumps(json_data, indent=4).encode('utf-8')))
flowFile = session.get() if (flowFile != None): flowFile = session.write(flowFile, ModJSON()) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "filename", flowFile.getAttribute('filename').split('.')[0]+'_translated.json') session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) session.commit()

import json import java.io from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback
class ModJSON(StreamCallback): def __init__(self): pass def process(self, inputStream, outputStream): text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) obj = json.loads(text)
json_key = [] json_value = [] json_measure = [] json_type = [] for element in obj: if element != 'id' and element !='type': json_key.append(obj['id']) json_type.append(obj['type']) json_value.append(obj[element]['value']) json_measure.append(element)
json_data =[{"id": i, "value": v, "measure": m, "type": t} for i, v, m,t in zip(json_key, json_value, json_measure, json_type)]
outputStream.write(bytearray(json.dumps(json_data, indent=4).encode('utf-8')))
flowFile = session.get() if (flowFile != None): flowFile = session.write(flowFile, ModJSON()) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "filename", flowFile.getAttribute('filename').split('.')[0]+'_translated.json') session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) session.commit()
